companies.name: PINA FINA
companies.description: An online jewelry and apparel boutique based out of Chicago.

companies.name: Kinda Fit Kinda Fat Apparel
companies.description: Kinda Fit Kinda Fat has created a community dedicated to those who love fitness and food, a community where you can and should be proud of your body no matter what stage of the fitness journey you're on.

companies.name: LUVERS ONLY
companies.description: LUVERS ONLY is a Southern California clothing brand that strives to bring you garments that help create a sense of peace and harmony within oneself and the community.

companies.name: Mondaysuck
companies.description: Mondaysuck is a clothing brand based out of San Diego. Heavily influenced by streetwear culture and the West Coast vibe, they strive on the idea of delivering original and simplistic pieces that belong in your closet.

companies.name: ShopDenimDesigns
companies.description: Hand-painted denim jackets, bleach band tees, and tie dye sweatshirts - help a student pay for her college expenses and save up for post-graduation!

companies.name: Angelique, Ink
companies.description: Angelique, Ink by SoCal based Calligrapher, Angi Phillips: providing custom hand lettered design for brands and events worldwide, and teaching calligraphy to students everywhere.

companies.name: M.Lovewell
companies.description: A little shop of stationery goods & gifts + workshops!

companies.name: A La Drizzle
companies.description: Asian fusion baked goods! Located in Glendale, CA, A La Drizzle celebrates Asian fusion with ube bars & other rotating specials.

companies.name: The Birds & The Brie
companies.description: Custom cheese & charcuterie arrangements for any occasion! 72-hour notice required. Located in LA.

companies.name: Fi & Me Baking Co.
companies.description: They're a mother-daughter duo bringing delicious, gluten-free (& some vegan) sweets into your life. They've got cookies, muffins, and many other mouth-watering delights!

companies.name: HaiDonut
companies.description: HaiDonut makes gluten-free artisan butter mochi donuts - home-baked fresh with every order. Based in Torrance, CA.

companies.name: MICA MAKES
companies.description: Ube and Buko Pandan crinkle cookies - located in the Upland/Rancho area. Pickup only!

companies.name: Shubis Poke
companies.description: Hawaiian-style poke & musubis - located in Walnut/Diamond Bar area.

companies.name: Sweet Pal O' Mine Bakeshop
companies.description: Sweet Pal O' Mine Bakeshop creates more than just dessert for you, they create memories for all your special life events! Custom cakes and specialty desserts made from scratch using only fresh and real ingredients.

companies.name: Personal Training - Bodybuilding, Nutrition & Diet
companies.description: Want to reach your fitness and nutrition goals? Start a healthy eating habit that'll stick? Jen will help you reach your goals - training & nutrition plans tailored specifically for you.

companies.name: Personal Training - Powerlifting, Strongman, Nutrition & Diet
companies.description: If you want to start strength training, look no further. Stanley has expertise in powerlifting, strongman, and more. Whatever your strength or fitness goals are, he'll help you get there.

companies.name: Bouquets en Papier
companies.description: Flowers that last forever! Bouquets en Papier creates paper flower bouquets. Every bouquet purchase plants a tree with non-profit One Tree Planted.

companies.name: Superbloom Co.
companies.description: A mom-owned company that's built on crafting anything & everything fun! From stickers and ornaments to mugs and planters, there's something here for everyone to love.

companies.name: Slowbound
companies.description: Hand-poured, 100% soy candles! Each candle is made with clean fragrance oils, with a burn life of 40-50 hours. Slowbound was created with the intention of self-care and to remind us that it's okay to slow down!
